entries.title: Musk Casts Doubt on Poll Wanting Him Gone as Twitter Head
entries.description: The billionaire has suggested the outcome of the vote he called might have been rigged.

entries.title: Omnibus Bill Expands Government TikTok Ban
entries.description: Tough measures targeting tech companies didn’t make the year-end spending legislation, after heavy lobbying by the industry.

entries.title: Mark Zuckerberg Testifies in FTC Case to Block Virtual-Reality Deal
entries.description: The commission is seeking to prevent Meta Platforms from acquiring the app maker behind virtual-reality fitness game “Supernatural.”

entries.title: EU to Probe Broadcom's $61 Billion Planned Takeover of VMware
entries.description: Europe’s competition regulator fears deal could limit competition for some hardware.

entries.title: Amazon Agrees to Settle EU Antitrust Cases, Avoiding Fines
entries.description: The online retail giant settled two antitrust cases related to allegations about its treatment of third-party sellers on its platform, ending some of the bloc’s most advanced cases targeting a U.S. tech company.

entries.title: Netflix's Ad Tier Was Least Popular Plan in Launch Month, Firm Estimates
entries.description: The streaming giant’s ad-supported plan accounted for 9% of new signups in the U.S. in November, according to subscription analytics firm Antenna

entries.title: Republicans Press Biden Officials on TikTok Security Concerns
entries.description: A pair of GOP lawmakers cited a WSJ article in seeking more information about the Chinese-owned video app.

entries.title: Tech Spending Pressures Fuel Demand for Specialized, Industry Clouds
entries.description: Made-to-fit industry clouds offer CIOs the promise of cost savings and vendors a means to reverse slowing cloud sales.

entries.title: This New App Wants to Pay You to Share Your Data For Advertising
entries.description: Caden Inc. hopes to give users thousands of dollars a year under one option of its data-sharing system, with lesser payments for more limited information.
